sage.scene

Class HUDString

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.SceneNode
      • sage.scene.Leaf
        • sage.scene.HUDObject
          • sage.scene.HUDString

  • public class HUDString
extends HUDObject
    HUDString defines a HUDObject which consists of a String. The location of the HUDObject defines the position of the lower left corner of the first character of the string.
    Author:
    John Clevenger

    • Nested Class Summary

      Draws this HUDString on the HUD using the specified IRenderer.

      Returns a new String which has the same characters as the String in this HUDString (that is, returns the text of this HUDString).

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        Returns a new String which has the same characters as the String in this HUDString (that is, returns the text of this HUDString).
        Returns:
        a String matching the contents of this HUDString

      • setText

        public void setText(java.lang.String newText)
